content.title: Geography
content.text: France is a country in Western Europe. The capital of France is Paris.

content.title: Literature
content.text: George Orwell wrote the novel '1984', which was published in 1949.

content.title: Biology
content.text: The blue whale is the largest mammal on Earth.

content.title: History
content.text: The American Civil War ended in 1865.

content.title: Physics
content.text: The speed of light is approximately 299,792 kilometers per second.
